sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the ''Myraham'' is a fat-bellied trading galley from [[Oldtown]].
sections.TOP:
Myraham013231aurvi3pi956sjtuks0yf4k9do6z00t71754362015-03-05T21:52:18ZSharp Blades26158496[[File:Myraham2x02.jpg|right|thumb|300px|[[Theon Greyjoy]] aboard the ''Myraham''.]]
The '''''Myraham''''' is a [[merchant]] [[Ships|ship]].
sections.History:
===[[Season 2]]===
The [[Ships|ship]] transports [[Theon Greyjoy]] from [[Seagard]] in [[the Riverlands]] to [[Lordsport]] on [[Pyke (island)|Pyke]]. Theon has a brief affair with the [[captain's daughter]] while onboard.<ref>"[[The Night Lands]]"</ref>
